meanings: (팔·손가락 등을) (접히다) be folded, be doubled, (비틀리다) be twisted

vlive.korean: 사실 고양이들 중에는 저렇게 꼬리가 꺾여서 있는 거죠. Some cats have bent tails. 듣기 View video V Animal Family : 고양이 보금자리 새단장! New interior for Cats! (ft. 박정윤수의사)
저거는 생겨날 때부터, 태어날 때부터 꺾여서 태어난 거기 때문에요. They are born like that. They are born with bent tails. 듣기 View video V Animal Family : 고양이 보금자리 새단장! New interior for Cats! (ft. 박정윤수의사)
vlive.english: They are born like that. They are born with bent tails.
